preguntas_respuestas.¿Detectas algún comportamiento anómalo e: Sí, se detectan comportamientos anómalos en estos logs.
preguntas_respuestas.¿Hay intentos de acceso fallidos?¿Dime c: Sí, hay intentos de acceso fallidos con las alertas "Multiple authentication failures followed by a success", "sshd: brute force trying to get access to the system. Authentication failed", "Multiple authentication failures", "syslog: User missed the password more than one time", "PAM: Multiple failed logins in a small period of time", "Maximum authentication attempts exceeded", "syslog: User authentication failure", "PAM: User login failed", "sshd: authentication failed".
